channel.title: Portainer on Experimental Knowledge
channel.description: Recent content in Portainer on Experimental Knowledge

item.title: Portainer Install
item.description: インストール 参考: Deployment Quick start dockerコマンド $ docker volume create portainer_data $ docker run -d \ -p 9000:9000 \ --name portainer \ --restart always \ -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock \ -v portainer_data:/data \ portainer/portainer docker-composeコマンド $ docker-compose up -d $ cat docker-compose.yml version: '2' services: portainer: image: portainer/portainer ports: - "9000:9000" volumes: - /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock - portainer_data:/data restart: always volumes: portainer_data: Docker for Windowsの注意点 Docker for Windows Ver.18.03.0 でdocker-composeを利用すると、以下のエラー発生
